New Records: Luka Doncic scored 32 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists in the game.
The Dallas Mavericks achieved a large victory margin over the Orlando Magic.
Luka Doncic made five three-pointers in the first half.
The Mavericks led by as many as 33 points during the fourth quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Doncic described the game as'real fun' due to the team's defensive efforts and pace of play.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orlando Magic struggled with their three-point shooting, making only eight out of 41 attempts.
The Dallas Mavericks' win extended their momentum after previous successes.
Others: The game was played on November 4, 2024, at American Airlines Center in Dallas, Texas.
